show_name: Dr. Pinoko no Mori no Bōken (movie)
other_title: Dr. ピノコの森の冒険 (Japanese)
Dr. 皮諾可的森林冒險 (Chinese (Taiwan))
plot: Dr. Black Jack forgot his doctor's bag, and his assistant (plus self-claimed "wife") Pinoko rushed to deliver the bag but found herself lost in the forest. Guided by a butterfly, she found that many animals in the forest are sick or injured, and Pinoko used her knowledge to help those animals.
